alert.note: Alert for Atkinson; Clinch (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 3:22PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Atkinson and northwestern Clinch Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 321 PM EDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Lakeland, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Atkinson and northwestern Clinch Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
